response.overview: Moras, a man who lost everything, spends his life on the streets sinking his memories in alcohol. Akelbek, on the other hand, has a family, a job, a home, what most people would call success. What motivates him to befriend a homeless man? Inspired by testimonies of men and women of Kyrgyzstan, Moras and Akelbekâ€™s story takes the audience on a great journey of trust, love, and grace
response.title: Greater Grace
